content:
• Wednesday, September 7, 2011
  • PLL-OLD

    Pall Corp. (NYSE:PLL-OLD) outlines a mixed outlook for the company's FQ4, now estimating sales...

    Pall Corp. (NYSE:PLL-OLD) outlines a mixed outlook for the company's FQ4, now estimating sales will exceed Wall Street's expectations but seeing weaker-than-expected profit due to weakness in its industrial segment. Shares -5.3% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:17 PM
  • AOBC

    Smith & Wesson (SWHC) reports an FQ1 EPS of $0.01 and revenue of $99.2M, beating analysts'...

    Smith & Wesson (SWHC) reports an FQ1 EPS of $0.01 and revenue of $99.2M, beating analysts' estimates for a breakeven EPS on $95M in revenue. The company lowers FY12 guidance however, now anticipating revenue to be between $410M and $425M, on the low-end of expectations. Shares -5.2% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:40 PM | 2 Comments
  • HOV

    Hovnanian's (NYSE:HOV) FQ3 beats across-the-board as losses narrowed on fewer land-related...

    Hovnanian's (NYSE:HOV) FQ3 beats across-the-board as losses narrowed on fewer land-related charges. Net contracts increased 33% Y/Y to 1,297 homes, while the contract backlog on the same basis ended up 13%. Shares +4.3%.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:19 PM
  • CLMT

    Calumet Specialty Products (NASDAQ:CLMT) announces an 11M share secondary offering. The company...

    Calumet Specialty Products (NASDAQ:CLMT) announces an 11M share secondary offering. The company plans to use the net proceeds to fund a portion of its Murphy Oil refinery acquisition. Shares -4.9% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:07 PM
  • GIII

    G-III Apparel (NASDAQ:GIII) resumes after-hours trading following a brief halt. Shares are...

    G-III Apparel (NASDAQ:GIII) resumes after-hours trading following a brief halt. Shares are currently -11.6%.
     
     
     
     
    | 4:52 PM
  • RPTP

    Raptor Pharmaceutical (NASDAQ:RPTP) announces a secondary offering - however, the size, terms...

    Raptor Pharmaceutical (NASDAQ:RPTP) announces a secondary offering - however, the size, terms and conditions have not been set. The company expects to use the net proceeds to fund commercial and pre-commercial efforts, clinical and preclinical development programs and other general corporate activities. Shares -5.5% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:47 PM
  • SEAC

    Cable infrastructure gear vendor SeaChange (NASDAQ:SEAC) is down 7.5% AH after reporting FQ2...

    Cable infrastructure gear vendor SeaChange (NASDAQ:SEAC) is down 7.5% AH after reporting FQ2 revenue of $50.1M (-3% Y/Y) and EPS of $0.12, missing consensus by $5.6M and $0.04. The company blames the shortfall on "unforecasted delays" in recognizing revenue. Earlier today, it was reported SeaChange had won a new software deal with Comcast.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:41 PM
  • GIII

    G-III Apparel (NASDAQ:GIII), whose shares rose 9.6% today, has been halted AH after reporting...

    G-III Apparel (NASDAQ:GIII), whose shares rose 9.6% today, has been halted AH after reporting soft FQ2 results. EPS of $0.08 missed by $0.12, and the company's FY12 EPS guidance of $2.25-$2.35 falls well short of the $3.21 consensus. The bottom-line weakness is blamed on "providing higher levels of support and discounts" to customers.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:31 PM | 1 Comment
  • NFLX

    A bearish note from Janney's Tony Wilbe may have helped send Netflix (NFLX -1.3%) lower today,...

    A bearish note from Janney's Tony Wilbe may have helped send Netflix (NFLX -1.3%) lower today, as might have a quick remark from Citi chairman Dick Parsons suggesting he's bearish on the company. On the flip side, Wilbe's note likely boosted Dish Network (DISH +6.2%), given its speculation about Starz cutting a deal with Dish. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 4:15 PM | 3 Comments
  • RF

    Regions Financial (RF +11.8%) continues to climb higher late in the day after being upgraded to...

    Regions Financial (RF +11.8%) continues to climb higher late in the day after being upgraded to buy on valuation earlier at Deutsche Bank.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:22 PM
  • NVDA

    Nvidia (NVDA +8.2%) continues trading higher after issuing strong FY13 revenue guidance. Wells...

    Nvidia (NVDA +8.2%) continues trading higher after issuing strong FY13 revenue guidance. Wells Fargo is lifting its estimates, and thinks Nvidia's guidance has positive implications for the PC demand environment. Meanwhile, Roth Capital expects the company's Tegra chips to power Amazon's (NASDAQ:AMZN) upcoming Android tablets. Rival AMD is up 7.5%.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:18 PM
  • FCX

    Workers at a Peruvian mine where Freeport-McMoRan (FCX +2.2%) owns a controlling stake have...

    Workers at a Peruvian mine where Freeport-McMoRan (FCX +2.2%) owns a controlling stake have begun a 2-day strike, and are threatening to strike indefinitely on Sep. 14 if demands for higher wages aren't met. Freeport shares don't seem affected by the news, but those of Peruvian miner Buenaventura (BVN -3.6%) are moving lower.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:59 PM
  • OWW

    Travelport, which owns 48% of Orbitz Worldwide (OWW +5.5%), signs a multi-year partnership deal...

    Travelport, which owns 48% of Orbitz Worldwide (OWW +5.5%), signs a multi-year partnership deal with Travelclick. Under the agreement, TravelClick will sell Travelport's Headline, a screen display advertising platform that allows hotels to market their products or brands to travel agencies worldwide.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:46 PM
  • UACL

    Universal Truckload Services (UACL +8%) shares pop after announcing a special one-time cash...

    Universal Truckload Services (UACL +8%) shares pop after announcing a special one-time cash dividend of $1 per share late yesterday.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:25 PM
  • ALGN

    Align Technology (ALGN +4.9%) says it plans to consolidate its CAD/CAM services and...

    Align Technology (ALGN +4.9%) says it plans to consolidate its CAD/CAM services and scanner-related activities located in Carlstadt, New Jersey with other existing operations. The transition will begin in Q411 and is expected to be completed by Q312.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:04 PM
  • GM

    Two analyst approvals for General Motors (GM +5.4%): Citigroup adds the stock to the firm's "Top...

    Two analyst approvals for General Motors (GM +5.4%): Citigroup adds the stock to the firm's "Top Picks Live" list, and Morgan Stanley deems it "most likely to succeed" in another recession, thanks to its "fortress balance sheet" philosophy. Citi cites its vehicle density survey which suggests auto buyers may be showing a "surprising" level of resiliency in the weakening economy.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:58 PM
  • MMSI

    Merit Medical Systems (MMSI +4.8%) trades higher after saying it's received regulatory approvals...

    Merit Medical Systems (MMSI +4.8%) trades higher after saying it's received regulatory approvals for several of its products in the United States, China and Singapore.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:55 PM
  • FL

    Foot Locker (FL +5.3%) is higher today after Cannacord initiates the shares with a buy rating...

    Foot Locker (FL +5.3%) is higher today after Cannacord initiates the shares with a buy rating and a price target of $28.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:54 PM
  • VEON

    Russian mobile carrier VimpelCom (VIP) is down 3.6% after reporting Q2 EPS of $0.19. Earnings...

    Russian mobile carrier VimpelCom (VIP) is down 3.6% after reporting Q2 EPS of $0.19. Earnings were hurt by higher interest and depreciation costs relation to its acquisition of international carrier Wind Telecom. Revenues grew 9% Y/Y to $6B, and mobile subscribers 11% to 192.7M, after accounting for the acquisition.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:51 PM
  • COF

    Capital One (COF +5%), now one of the largest U.S. banks, has been caught in the stock downdraft...

    Capital One (COF +5%), now one of the largest U.S. banks, has been caught in the stock downdraft buffeting financials, but Oppenheimer says it doesn't make sense, as its two acquisitions this summer "together should be substantially accretive to both earnings and tangible book value." The firm upgrades the shares to Outperform from Perform.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:42 PM
  • UAM

    Universal American (UAM +5.6%) pops on a Wedbush upgrade to outperform, citing the company's...

    Universal American (UAM +5.6%) pops on a Wedbush upgrade to outperform, citing the company's release from sanctions and potential as a takeover candidate.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:34 PM
  • NFLX

    Netflix (NFLX -1.9%) is down in an otherwise up market, as its recent string of announcements...

    Netflix (NFLX -1.9%) is down in an otherwise up market, as its recent string of announcements (I, II) have put a sour taste in the mouths of customers and investors. The latest: new limitations on the number of concurrent streams allowed per account. "It doesn't make a lot of sense to give subscribers less at the same time that they are charging more," Wedbush's Michael Pachter says.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:26 PM
  • WPRT

    Westport Innovations (WPRT +17.1%) announces a co-marketing program with Shell (NYSE:RDS.A) to...

    Westport Innovations (WPRT +17.1%) announces a co-marketing program with Shell (NYSE:RDS.A) to develop a commercial solution to deliver natural gas-powered vehicles in North America. Trading on WPRT in Canada was briefly halted before shares resumed their rocket ride.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:25 PM | 3 Comments
  • RDEA

    Ardea Biosciences (RDEA +6%) is trading higher after saying earlier that it's completed its...

    Ardea Biosciences (RDEA +6%) is trading higher after saying earlier that it's completed its end-of-phase 2 meetings with the FDA, and has reached an agreement on key aspects of its proposed lesinurad development plan for phase 3.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:24 PM
  • SXI

    Durable goods manufacturer Standex (NYSE:SXI) gains 13.8% after reporting FQ4 revenue of $174.6M...

    Durable goods manufacturer Standex (NYSE:SXI) gains 13.8% after reporting FQ4 revenue of $174.6M (+15% Y/Y, 9.3% organic growth) and EPS of $0.81, beating consensus by $4M and $0.06. EPS growth of 34% easily outpaced sales growth, and all five of the company's divisions reported annual revenue increases. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 1:13 PM
  • SCMR

    Sycamore Networks (SCMR +5.8%) rallies in a combination of relief and short-covering after its...

    Sycamore Networks (SCMR +5.8%) rallies in a combination of relief and short-covering after its FQ4 revenues and net loss per share narrowly beats Street estimates. Despite the pop in share price, the results and follow-on comments were less than stellar, with a sharp drop in earnings Y/Y and delays in the do-or-die launch of its IQstream.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:56 PM
  • FSYS

    Natural gas futures move 1.6% higher breaking through the $4 level after another Tropical Storm...

    Natural gas futures move 1.6% higher breaking through the $4 level after another Tropical Storm looks set to track towards the U.S. and oil prices gain. A few natural gas players are soaring on M&A chatter, easily outpacing other energy stocks: Fuel Systems Solutions (FSYS +8.5%), Westport Innovations (WPRT +18.2%), Clean Energy Fuels (CLNE +12.9%).

     
     
     
     
    | 12:49 PM
  • PSTI

    Pluristem (PSTI +7%) jumps today after recent studies show its placental expanded (NYSEMKT:PLX)...

    Pluristem (PSTI +7%) jumps today after recent studies show its placental expanded (NYSEMKT:PLX) cells are potentially effective in treating life threatening hematopoietic complications associated with Acute Radiation Syndrome.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:38 PM
  • THC

    Tenet Healthcare (THC +5.7%) is higher after Moody's raises its outlook to positive, citing...

    Tenet Healthcare (THC +5.7%) is higher after Moody's raises its outlook to positive, citing improved cash flows and decreased leverage.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:18 PM
  • VRSN

    VeriSign's (NASDAQ:VRSN) cancellation of an appearance at a Citigroup tech conference yesterday...

    VeriSign's (NASDAQ:VRSN) cancellation of an appearance at a Citigroup tech conference yesterday and another cancellation next week probably have more to do with its CEO search, but they're sparking another day of takeover rumors, buttressed by a note from ThinkEquity. VRSN shares, which rallied 6.8% yesterday, +7.2% today.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:59 AM
  • OMX

    Shares of Officemax (OMX +6.3%) and Staples (SPLS +3.5%) feel the upward pull of gravity from...

    Shares of Officemax (OMX +6.3%) and Staples (SPLS +3.5%) feel the upward pull of gravity from rival Office Depot's (ODP +11.2%) big gain in share price following its update on the back-to-school season at the Goldman Sachs retail conference. Staples CEO didn't provide much color at the same conference, saying the season was "OK," neither a "downer" or "robust."

     
     
     
     
    | 11:49 AM
  • WSM

    Williams-Sonoma (WSM +3.3%) moves higher after Cowen ups it to outperform, citing...

    Williams-Sonoma (WSM +3.3%) moves higher after Cowen ups it to outperform, citing better-than-anticipated growth of its e-commerce channel.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:43 AM
  • MEET

    Latino online social network Quepasa (QPSA +14.5%) pops after saying that its first proprietary...

    Latino online social network Quepasa (QPSA +14.5%) pops after saying that its first proprietary social gaming title, Wonderful City - Rio, achieved 4.4M installs, including over 1.1M new downloads in August alone.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:37 AM
  • UNTD

    United Online (NASDAQ:UNTD) is up 8.9% after Benchmark's Daniel Kurnos starts coverage with a...

    United Online (NASDAQ:UNTD) is up 8.9% after Benchmark's Daniel Kurnos starts coverage with a Buy and $7 PT. Kurnos thinks the strength of United's Content & Media division, which includes Classmates.com and the FTD floral services business, will offset ongoing subscriber losses at its cash-cow NetZero dial-up Internet business.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:17 AM
  • PUDA

    Puda Coal Inc. (OTC:PUDA -20%) is hit hard after the SEC notifies Chairman Ming Zhao that it...

    Puda Coal Inc. (OTC:PUDA -20%) is hit hard after the SEC notifies Chairman Ming Zhao that it plans to seek civil charges against him on allegations that he violated U.S. securities laws.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:14 AM
  • QUAD

    Printing services provider Quad/Graphics (NYSE:QUAD) is up 10.6% after announcing a $100M share...

    Printing services provider Quad/Graphics (NYSE:QUAD) is up 10.6% after announcing a $100M share repurchase program. As of June 30, Quad had only $105M in cash and investments, and over $1.6B in debt. The company currently has a market cap of $950M.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:07 AM
  • PDCE

    Petroleum Development (PETD +19%) jumps after saying it's entered the Utica Shale play in...

    Petroleum Development (PETD +19%) jumps after saying it's entered the Utica Shale play in Southeastern Ohio with lease acquisitions of up to 30,000 net acres.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:06 AM
  • AABA

    Maybe Yahoo's (YHOO +3.2%) biggest problem is chairman Roy Bostock, not Carol Bartz. Bostock was...

    Maybe Yahoo's (YHOO +3.2%) biggest problem is chairman Roy Bostock, not Carol Bartz. Bostock was board chairman when Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) made its $31/share bid for Yahoo in 2008, and his latest gaffe of firing Bartz over the phone was "an act of cowardice [that] allowed Bartz to immediately manage the public relations of the event," Doug McIntyre writes.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:53 AM | 1 Comment
  • CONN

    Home appliance and electronics retailer Conn's (NASDAQ:CONN) surges 25.7% after reporting FQ2...

    Home appliance and electronics retailer Conn's (NASDAQ:CONN) surges 25.7% after reporting FQ2 revenue of $184.4M (-14% Y/Y) and EPS of $0.17; the former missed consensus by $0.4M, but the latter beat by $0.06. Same-store sales declined 12.8% Y/Y. The company now expects FY12 EPS of $0.65-$0.75, above a $0.54 consensus.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:47 AM
  • WMB

    Williams Cos. (WMB +4.3%) is higher this morning after raising its quarterly dividend by 25% and...

    Williams Cos. (WMB +4.3%) is higher this morning after raising its quarterly dividend by 25% and detailing plans to spin off its upstream exploration and production business. The company also said it plans to pay out all of the distributions it receives from Williams Partners L.P.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:43 AM
  • BAC

    Josh Brown thinks the Bank of America (BAC +3.5%) reorg isn't going to save Merrill Lynch, and...

    Josh Brown thinks the Bank of America (BAC +3.5%) reorg isn't going to save Merrill Lynch, and Sallie Krawcheck "never really had a shot" to make it work: "Sallie couldn't change the fact that the brokers have no interest in peddling bank products or making referrals to other divisions... [or] change the fact that once the brand name is tarnished, there is little reason for the salesforce to stay."

     
     
     
     
    | 10:36 AM
  • FCEL

    Fuel Cell Energy (FCEL +24.3%), a maker of stationary fuel cells, soars after reporting FQ3...

    Fuel Cell Energy (FCEL +24.3%), a maker of stationary fuel cells, soars after reporting FQ3 revenue of $31.2M (+65% Y/Y) and EPS of -$0.07, beating consensus by $2.2M and $0.02. The company's backlog stood at $230.6M as of 7/31, up 70% Q/Q. 2011 cash burn is expected to be at the low end of a prior guidance range of $24M-$32M.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:33 AM
  • VDSI-OLD

    VASCO Data Security (VDSI-OLD -5.5%) trades lower after Wunderlich downgrades the shares to...

    VASCO Data Security (VDSI-OLD -5.5%) trades lower after Wunderlich downgrades the shares to hold, citing potential losses from the hack of its wholly owned subsidiary DigiNotar.
     
     
     
     
    | 10:27 AM
  • SSYS

    Shares of Stratasys (SSYS +14.5%) soar on heavy volume after Dougherty upgrades the company to a...

    Shares of Stratasys (SSYS +14.5%) soar on heavy volume after Dougherty upgrades the company to a Buy rating from Neutral on valuation, and increases its price target to $32 from $28.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:23 AM
  • WLT

    Coal stocks (KOL +4.6%) are soaring after Walter Energy (WLT +24.4%) looks to be in play as a...

    Coal stocks (KOL +4.6%) are soaring after Walter Energy (WLT +24.4%) looks to be in play as a takeover candidate and investors ponder who might be next in line. Gainers: ANR +8.3%, CHNR +5.8%, ACI +5.6%, BTU +5.6%, LLEN +4.7%.
     
     
     
     
    | 10:01 AM
  • S

    Shares of Sprint (S +2.8%) move higher a day after announcing a lawsuit to block the AT&T (T...

    Shares of Sprint (S +2.8%) move higher a day after announcing a lawsuit to block the AT&T (T +0.5%)/T-Mobile (OTCQX:DTEGY) merger. Legal analysts say the suit faces an "uphill climb" on the merits of the case, but as a strategic maneuver could still reap benefits if AT&T settles with the DOJ.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:53 AM
  • MTG

    Mortgage insurance stocks break higher after MGIC Investment Corp.’s (MTG +13.5%) main...

    Mortgage insurance stocks break higher after MGIC Investment Corp.’s (MTG +13.5%) main mortgage insurance unit says it wrote $1.3B in new insurance in August while its inventory of delinquent loans fell. Other mortgage insurers also rise: RDN +8.9%, PMI +3.7%.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:45 AM
  • TEVA

    Teva Pharmaceuticals (TEVA +1.5%) announces top-line results for an ADHD treatment for adults...

    Teva Pharmaceuticals (TEVA +1.5%) announces top-line results for an ADHD treatment for adults met primary endpoints. Shares of TEVA have gained steadily (+13%) since being weighed down by Medicare payment fears in early August.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:43 AM

  • Gold is off sharply, -2.2% to $1,831/oz., with most of the move occurring in about a 10 minute...

    Gold is off sharply, -2.2% to $1,831/oz., with most of the move occurring in about a 10 minute stretch around midnight last night. There was no particular news other than chatter about a boatload of contracts being offered. Does gold's decline mean inflation is now a concern?
     
     
     
     
    | 9:03 AM | 3 Comments
  • AMAG

    The proposed $686M merger between Amag Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:AMAG) and Allos Therapeutics...

    The proposed $686M merger between Amag Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:AMAG) and Allos Therapeutics (NASDAQ:ALTH) could be scuttled after two large shareholders of AMAG threaten to vote against the transaction. Reports say the investors are evaluating if a management shakeup or supporting a tender offer from MSMB Capital might be better options. AMAG +8.1% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:54 AM
  • AABA

    Needham is reiterating a Buy on Yahoo (YHOO) following news of Carol Bartz's firing, believing...

    Needham is reiterating a Buy on Yahoo (YHOO) following news of Carol Bartz's firing, believing the move "suggests a greater likelihood of event upside," such as a PE buyout. The firm also thinks AOL deserves to trade higher on the news, since it makes for a good acquisition target for Yahoo. YHOO +6.1% premarket. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 8:53 AM
  • AABA

    Yahoo (YHOO) +6.1% premarket on the Carol Bartz firing, but analysts aren’t as impressed....

    Yahoo (YHOO) +6.1% premarket on the Carol Bartz firing, but analysts aren’t as impressed. Barclays, for example, believes the change "extends Yahoo’s turnaround timeframe and could further destabilize its sales force." Jefferies sees a challenge for the board to find a player willing to take on the task, and that Yahoo probably will sell itself before another CEO is announced.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:53 AM
  • URBN

    Urban Outfitters (NASDAQ:URBN) reports in a 10-Q filing comparable store sales fell 3.3% for the...

    Urban Outfitters (NASDAQ:URBN) reports in a 10-Q filing comparable store sales fell 3.3% for the six months ending July 31 due to a decrease in transactions, lower units per transaction and lower average unit sales prices. Shares -8.1% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:32 AM
  • WLT

    Walter Energy (NYSE:WLT) is up 15% premarket on takeover speculation. BHP Billiton (NYSE:BHP)...

    Walter Energy (NYSE:WLT) is up 15% premarket on takeover speculation. BHP Billiton (NYSE:BHP) and Anglo American (OTCPK:AAUKY) are rumored to be interested in making an offer as high as $120 per share for the natural gas and coal producer.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:20 AM | 1 Comment
  • AABA

    After Carol Bartz's phone firing, what next for Yahoo (YHOO)? Aside from a 6.3% gain AH in U.S....

    After Carol Bartz's phone firing, what next for Yahoo (YHOO)? Aside from a 6.3% gain AH in U.S. trading, Yahoo Japan rose 1.9% in Tokyo trading, and co-controller Softbank (OTCPK:SFTBY) rose 2.9%. And what about employee direction and morale? Ex-VP Brad Garlinghouse's tweet of "ding dong the witch is dead" may sum up the feelings of employees who had a 33% approval rating on Bartz.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:14 AM | 4 Comments
